Properties Methods Events Config Options Direct Link

Class Ext.data.DataWriter

Package:Ext.data
Defined In:DataWriter.js
Class:DataWriter
Subclasses:JsonWriter
Extends:Object
Abstract base class for writing structured data from a data source and converting it into a JSON-string containing Ext.data.Record objects and metadata for use by an Ext.data.Store. This class is intended to be extended and should not be created directly. For existing implementations, see Ext.data.JsonWriter,

Config Options

Config OptionsDefined By
 dataProperty : String
The property-name in request-params where data will be written (defaults to 'data').
DataWriter
 writeAllFields : Boolean
true by default to have DataWriter return ALL fields of a modified record -- not just those that changed. false to ha...
true by default to have DataWriter return ALL fields of a modified record -- not just those that changed. false to have DataWriter only request modified fields from a record.
DataWriter
